description.raw:
First version of the communications API. These are the three main components of this pull request:

* SwarmBrokerPlugin: World plugin that centralizes all the communication sent from the agents.

* SwarmRobotPlugin: Model plugin that will be the base class from which to derive when creating a plugin to control an agent. It provides all the communication functionality to the agent plugin.

* TeamControllerPlugin: This is an example model plugin that shows how the teams would use the Swarm API.

I have included a sample world file for testing the functionality.

Compile as usual, and then run:

`gzserver ../worlds/swarm_empty.world --verbose`

I'll start working on tests on the next pull request, this is big enough.
